pages.text: Runes are at the core of everything here, there's one for every letter, plus a few extra ones! $(br2)$(item)Rune Dust$() is required to start, this is made from Ash and $(item)Nether Warts$() on the one hand. $(item)Ash$() can be found as blocks in the nether in basalt deltas or by killing $(thing)Blazes$().
All the $(item)Runes$() of the alphabet can now be crafted from the dust.
You can also place runes on the ground, they have the property of marking all living beings that touch them, even through obstacles!
